enhanced_description: GreatDay HR is a comprehensive, one-stop Human Resource Information System (HRIS) designed to streamline HR operations and enhance employee experience. This cloud-based solution simplifies critical HR tasks, from payroll and attendance management to automated workflows, effortless recruitment, and seamless performance management. It empowers companies to automate routine tasks, reduce paperwork, and maintain accurate records, including fraud-free attendance tracking via face recognition technology. Serving over 3,000 Asian companies, GreatDay HR aims to foster a happier and more engaged workforce, offering a user-friendly experience and expert support for lasting organizational benefits.
